CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(FloorCode__c),FloorCode__c == "F"),"F00",FloorCode__c) + "-" + IF(OR(ISBLANK(AreaCode__c), AreaCode__c == "A"),"A00",AreaCode__c) + "-" + IF(OR(ISBLANK(SectionCode__c), SectionCode__c == "S"),"S00",SectionCode__c)+ "-" + IF(OR(ISBLANK(Rack__c), Rack__c == "R"),"R00",Rack__c)+ "-" + IF(OR(ISBLANK(Level__c), Level__c == "L"),"L00",Level__c)
CustomField.label: LOCATOR CODE
